examples.example: 在这场精彩的演讲中，他的观点让人受益匪浅，赢得了一席热烈的掌声。

translate.english: In this wonderful speech, his point of view benefited people a lot and won a burst of warm applause.

examples.example: 在这次聚会中，他的一番真诚话语，赢得了一席朋友们的称赞。

translate.english: In this gathering, his sincere words won the praise of a group of friends.

examples.example: 在这次座谈会上，他的独到见解赢得了一席专家们的认可。

translate.english: At this symposium, his unique insights won the recognition of a group of experts.
